title: Spiritual Detox RV | Sermons | North Heights Church
description: Join Pastor TJ in a message about Spiritual Detox and taking all thoughts captive to the obedience of Christ.
cleaned_text: [Romans 12:1-2](https://cloud.bible/NASB/romans/12/1-2) Sermon Notes You can add your own personal sermon notes along the way. When you're finished, you'll be able to email or download your notes. Series Information In this four-part Detox series, we will explore ways to cleanse our spirits, souls, minds, and bodies to rid ourselves of impurities and grow deeper with God.
